original_title: Hillsong UNITED: The People Tour (Live from Madison Square Garden)
overview: Recorded live from their sold out show at Madison Square Garden on July 2, 2019, Hillsong UNITED invites you to re-experience the powerful and captivating night in The People Tour: Live from Madison Square Garden. Joined by Amanda Lindsay Cook and Mack Brock, UNITED shares stories of the birth of their most iconic songs interwoven throughout passionate live performances.
title: Hillsong UNITED: The People Tour (Live from Madison Square Garden)
